title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 135.1 - Membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 135.1 - Membership

State Regulations

All employees subject to the provision of

Part 24 of this Title shall participate in the sick leave bank program
established by this Part unless they decline membership in writing by filing
the required waiver form with the Division of Human Resources of the Office of

Court Administration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
135.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
